title: Client Management: Verify client manager is there in the admin portal
custom_preconds: Given you are in the admin portal
custom_steps: When you go to the admin portal
custom_expected: Then you will see the client manager

title: Client Management: Verify that when CM Client Manager is clicked on the expected columns are there
custom_preconds: Given you are on the admin portal
custom_steps: When you go to the client manager
custom_expected: Then the table that opens has 3 columns (name, username, password)

title: Client Management: Verify an edit screen opens for a user
custom_preconds: Given you are in the admin portal
custom_steps:
When you are are logged into the client manager
And 'edit' is clicked
custom_expected: Then the edit screen should open

title: Invalid Number: In 'Add New Phone Number' field, enter a number that is invalid
custom_preconds:
Given the number is less than 7 digits
And non-numeric chars
And combination of non-numeric chars and numbers
custom_steps: When you enter the the invalid number
custom_expected: Then the message returned that says "Phone Number is not valid"

title: Valid Number: Attempt to add a number that has previously been entered
custom_preconds:
Given the number you are entering is valid
And numeric only
And 7 digits, 10 digits, 11 digits, or 13 digits
And the number has been previously entered successfully
custom_steps: When you enter the number in 'Add a New Phone Number' field
custom_expected: Then a pop up with Phone Number Already Exists In The Blacklisted List should appear

title: Valid Number: Click '+' sign when adding a new number
custom_preconds: Given you are using a valid number
custom_steps:
When in 'Add New Phone Number' field enter a valid phone number 
And click the '+' sign
custom_expected: Then you will see a Pop up that will read "The phone number will be blacklisted. Are you sure Ok and Cancel"

title: Valid Number: Click 'cancel' when attempting to add a new number and verify that that number has not been added.
custom_preconds:
Given you are using a valid number
And that number has not been added already
custom_steps:
When you are attempting to add a new number
And enter that new number
And hit cancel before submitting
custom_expected: Then that number should not have been added

title: Valid Number: Add a number successfully
custom_preconds:
Given you are using a valid number
And that number has not been added already
custom_steps:
When you enter the new number to be added to the blacklist
And Click ok
custom_expected: Then the user will receive the message 'The given phone number has been successfully blacklisted'

title: Search: When searching for a number there are 4 fields of data that are returned
custom_preconds: Given you are on the blacklist screen
custom_steps:
When you go to the blacklist screen
And attempt to search for a number
custom_expected: Then there are 4 fields of data that are returned (Action, Phone Number, Is BlackListed, Last Modified)

title: Search: Searching for a phone number is in 13 digit format
custom_preconds:
Given you have a 13 digit phone number
And that number is already listed in the blacklist
custom_steps:
When you go to search for a blacklist number
And enter in the 13 digit phone number
And hit search
custom_expected: Then you will have successful search result

title: Search: Successful blacklist list search
custom_preconds: Given you are searching for a number that is already blacklisted
custom_steps: When you search for that number
custom_expected:
Then 'Yes' is under Is Blacklisted 
And the Action button should be UnBlacklist

title: Search: Unsuccessful blacklist search
custom_preconds:
Given you are using a valid number
And the number has not been previously blacklisted
custom_steps:
When you go to search for a blacklist number
And enter the number
custom_expected:
Then 'No' is under Is Blacklisted
And the Action button should be 'Blacklist'

title: Blacklist: Blacklist a number
custom_preconds:
Given you are using a valid number
And that number has not been previously blacklisted
custom_steps:
When you enter the number
And search
And click Blacklist
custom_expected: Then the status to Yes under IsBlacklisted

title: Blacklist: Unblacklist a number
custom_preconds:
Given you are using a valid number
And that number that has been previously blacklisted
custom_steps:
When you enter the number
And search
And clicked UnBlacklist
custom_expected: Then the status for that number will change the status to No under IsBlacklisted

title: Blacklist: A number cannot become blacklisted if that number is subscribed to a marketing campagin
custom_preconds:
Given you are using a valid number
And that number is part of a marketing campaign
custom_steps:
When you enter the number to search
And you try to blacklist the number
custom_expected: Then you will not be allowed to blacklist

title: Verify Blacklist: Verify blacklisting by sending a text to a quiz campaign
custom_preconds:
Given you are using a valid number
And that number is currently blacklisted
And there is an active quiz campaign to use for testing
custom_steps: When send a text from the phone number that has been blacklisted
custom_expected: Then verify that you do not receive a response

title: Verify Blacklist: Verify a blacklisted number does not win a quiz compaign even if the correct answer is sent
custom_preconds:
Given you are using a valid number
And that number is currently blacklisted
And there is an active quiz campaign
custom_steps: When you text into the quiz campaign number with your blacklisted number with the correct answer to the quiz
custom_expected:
Then you should not receive a response
And that number should not win because they are blacklisted

title: Verify Blacklist: Verify a number that has just been removed from the blacklist is able to receive a response after sending a text
custom_preconds:
Given you are using a valid number
And that number is blacklisted
custom_steps:
When you remove that number from the blacklist
And text into an active campaign with that number
custom_expected: Then you should receive a corresponding response to the phone

title: Verify Blacklist: Blacklisted numbers in bulkMT should not receive a text
custom_preconds:
Given you are using a valid number
And that number is currently blacklisted
custom_steps:
When you you add the blacklisted number to a bulkMT list
And attempt to send it a bulk text
custom_expected:
Then you should not receive a message on the blacklisted number
And should receive a message on all other numbers on that list that are not blacklisted

title: Verify Blacklist: Sending a message via bulkMT to a number that has just been removed from the blacklist should be received
custom_preconds:
Given you are using a valid number
And that number is currently blacklisted
custom_steps:
When you remove the blacklisted number from blacklist
And add that number to a bulkMT list
And send a message
custom_expected:
Then you will receive a message on the recently unblacklisted number
And you will receive a message on all other numbers on the bulkMT list

title: Verify Blacklist: Verify in a voting campaign that if a blacklisted number sends a message, that number does not recieve a response.
custom_preconds:
Given you are using a valid number
And there is an active voting campaign you can use to test
custom_steps:
When you blacklist a number
And from that number send a text to the voting campaign
custom_expected: Then you should not receive a response on that phone

title: Verify Blacklist: Verify that a number cannot be blacklisted if the number is signed up for a marketing campaign.
custom_preconds:
Given you are using a valid number
And there is an active marketing campaign you can use to test
custom_steps:
When you successfully sign up for a marketing campaign with a valid number
And attempt next to blacklist the number
custom_expected: Then you will not be allowed to blacklist the number

title: Verify Blacklist: Verify that a number can become blacklisted after it unsubscribes from the marketing campaign.
custom_preconds:
Given you are using a valid number
And there is an active marketing campaign you can use to test
custom_steps:
When you successfully add the valid number to an active marketing campaign
And next unsubscribe that number from the marketing campaign
And attempt to black list the number
custom_expected: Then you that number will be blacklisted

title: Verify Blacklist: Verify that  a blacklisted number cannot sign up for a marketing campaign.
custom_preconds:
Given you are using a valid number
And that number is blacklisted
And there is an active marketing campaign that you can use to test
custom_steps: When attempt to use a blacklisted number to sign up for a marketing campaign
custom_expected:
Then you will not be signed up
And the number will not receive a response

title: Verify Blacklist: Verify that a blacklisted number will not recieve any text messages from any mlb.com apps (ie. food ordering)
custom_preconds:
Given you are using a valid number
And that number is blacklisted
And you have food ordering app installed
And you are in a valid area to use the food ordering app
custom_steps: When you attempt to use the food app with a blacklisted number
custom_expected:
Then you will not be able to order food
And not receive a response on the blacklisted number
